PARAM.sqlvalue: SELECT t.engine FROM information_schema.tables t WHERE t.table_catalog='%VAR_BD_CATALOGO%' AND t.table_schema='%VAR_BD_DESTINO%' AND t.table_name='%VAR_TABLA_DESTINO%'

SELECT t2.character_set_name FROM information_schema.tables t INNER JOIN information_schema.collation_character_set_applicability t2 ON t.table_collation=t2.collation_name WHERE t.table_catalog='%VAR_BD_CATALOGO%' AND t.table_schema='%VAR_BD_DESTINO%' AND t.table_name='%VAR_TABLA_DESTINO%'
